price: 63. Taasu waa Jannada aan dhaxalsiinno  addoomahayaga kooda ka dhowrsada xumaha (oo noo hoggaansan).
arabic: تِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِي نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: til'ka al-janatu allatī nūrithu min ʿibādinā man kāna taqiyyan
